text: Exellente soupe et beau rapport qualité/prix! Belle place, pas trop petit & bon service! C'est à essayer!
Bonne bouffe mais le service était ordinaire... Par contre, c'est un apportez votre vin!

Resto asiatique de quartier sans prétention, mais quel incontournable parce qu'ils sont trop rare comme celui-ci dans ce créno.

Ingrédients frais, pas de cannage, soucis de plaire... Tout semble fait à mesure, rien de préfabriqué, pas de réchauffage au micro-onde. Les légumes cuits sont fermes à point... pas de bouette. Les sauces et marinades semblent être faite maison. Pas de mix de sauce de l'épicerie enterré avec du sirop de maïs.

Il y a beaucoup de grillade sur le menu. Ce qui plaira à ceux de la famille qui aime plus aller dans les rotisseries.

Ils m'ont vu prendre des photos, j'espère qu'ils ont toujours le même service.

It have been my preferred restaurant since 2004. I come very often but the last 3 times have been disappointing...
I do have the impression that they changed chef, as the chicken was not well cooked and have no taste anymore, only taste (and not that good) was the panure...
It was soaking on sauce, before was no sauce on the plate, it was caramelizing the chicken
I ate half of my plate, because I was really hungry not because it was good, before I would finish my whole plate and been already excited to come again
The wontons are also different on taste!
Just sad... I really loved this place for many years

Nice little Vietnamese Restaurent, well decorated and clean. Well prices for the quality of food. The beaf a chicken were both extremely tender. 
The veritable soup, more like a water soup comes with fresh spinach  and white mushrooms. The taste was simple and refreshing. I put a bit a spicy sauce to add a kick. It's a perfect starter.
The peanut butter chicken wasn't blading with flavours. Almost felt watered down. The crispy spinach almost made for the the lack of flavour. It was perfect ! Crispy and packed with flavour.
The grilled beaf and chicken was soft and melted in your mouth. The side salad was simple but fresh. 
Spring roles (chicken) are most likely made here. It's highly recommended .. 

Don't forget you bottle of wine !
Resto Vietnamien excellent. J'ai pris l'assiette de boeuf, poulet, crevette et rouleau pour 15$ apportez votre vin. Tout est  super bon et service impeccable. 30$ à deux! Je le recommande fortement.
